name: Word Wheel by POWGI
description:
The classic word wheel puzzle comes to iOS! Find as many words as you can from the letters shown, always using the middle letter! Can you find the 9-letter word?

Word Wheel by POWGI comes with 100 hand-crafted puzzles, each with its own leaderboard. Track your progress as you climb the online rankings.

With all the polish you'd expect from POWGI, Word Wheel has a clean, easy-to-use interface that lets you concentrate on the puzzle, rather than fight with the app.

Please email support@powgi.com if you need assistance. POWGI has excellent support and we'd rather help you than get a bad review.
